exceptions.text: While Coinify has aquired BIPS to allow for trading, only merchant accounts support TFA at this time. Trading is done through a separate account. Hardware support is limited to a print-out character matrix.

As of September 29th 2014, new user enrollment for 2FA is broken. A mobile phone and Garena account level 3 or higher is required for 2FA.

Software implementation requires use of the Steam Mobile app. It does not support multiple accounts on the same device. It does not support multiple accounts using the same phone number for SMS. Authentication on non-phone devices is not officially supported. SMS support is limited to receiving account recovery codes for password resets.
Software implementation requires you to have purchased either Final Fantasy XI or Final Fantasy XIV and registered the game.
